name: Wandering Haze
movement: 5 feet on the ground, 40 feet flying
description: The Wandering Haze is a gargantuan ooze resembling a chaotic cloud, capable of engulfing and manipulating its surroundings.
memorable: Its Sheath of Chaos action deals psychic damage and disorients enemies, causing them to move randomly.
goals: To ambush and damage creatures with its corrosive abilities.
relations: Potentially encountered with other oozes or creatures that thrive in foggy environments.
environment: Commonly found in damp, fog-laden areas, such as swamps or caves.
strengths: Immunity to acid and numerous condition immunities make it a resilient foe.
attacks: Performs three Pseudopod melee attacks that deal bludgeoning and acid damage combined.
most_powerful_ability: Acidic Cloudburst unleashes a torrential spray of acid affecting a wide area and reducing movement speed.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet for detecting creatures without sight.
skills: Has a passive perception of 15, indicating average awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Can move through very narrow spaces due to its Cloud Form ability.
Camouflages as an ordinary cloud when motionless, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
Does not require sleep, allowing for constant activity.
